ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Do not obey the orders of the profligate,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Do not follow those who are extravagant,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and do not follow the biddings of those that go to excesses
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Do not obey the orders of the transgressors
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And do not follow those who exceed the limits.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And follow not the command of the extravagant,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And do not obey the bidding of the extravagant,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and obey not the commandment of the prodigal
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And obey not the command of the prodigal,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: do not obey the bidding of those who are given to excesses,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And obey not the command of the extravagant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and do not obey the dictates of the transgressors,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And follow not the bidding of those who are extravagant,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And follow not the command of Al-Musrifun [i.e. their chiefs, leaders who were polytheists, criminals and sinners],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Do not obey the order of the wasteful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And do not obey the command of the extravagant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And do not obey the order of the transgressors,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:151] and do not obey the command of the prodigal,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And obey not the command of the prodigal) and obey not the words of the idolaters,
